inclusion.criterion: Laboratory confirmed serogroup A meningococcal disease
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: culture of serogroup A meningococci from the cerebrospinal fluid

inclusion.criterion: In target 1-29 year age group at the time of vaccination with MenAfriVac
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Refusal to participate in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Infants <1 year old and adults >29 years old
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 23-year-old man who came to the hospital with high blood pressure (175/95 mmHg) and signs of septicemia. He was diagnosed with atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome.
